# Comprehensive Plan - Policy Plan

The Policy Plan contains Board of Supervisors goals, policies and objectives regarding land use, transportation, housing, the environment, human services, public facilities, parks and recreation, revitalization, economic development and heritage resources.

## The Policy Plan has moved to the Encode Platform

On January 8, 2024, the current Policy Plan element of the Comprehensive Plan moved to the Encode platform. Encode is a user-friendly, web-based interface that also hosts the County’s Zoning Ordinance and Public Facilities Manual. At this time, no text changes or amendments were updated in the Policy Plan. Visitors to the website can expect to see a refreshed look and an improved user experience.

Should you have any questions regarding the Policy Plan, please contact the Planning Division at 703-324-1380, TTY 711 and ask to speak with the Planner of the Day.

View the Policy Plan on Encode

## Historic Comprehensive Plan Documents

View historic Comprehensive Plan documents dating back to the 1984 Edition for the Area Plans, and the 1990 Edition of the Policy Plan.
